document.docOrigin: Mémoires du Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle 196
document.masterDocTitle: New species and new records of scaphopods from New Caledonia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species and new records of scaphopods from New Caledonia
Mémoires du Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle

subSubSection.paragraph:
Fustiaria nipponica
- Scarabino 1995: 277, fig 83, 88e . Material cited: 78 lots (208 spms) from Chesterfield Plateau, New Caledonia , Loyalty Islands , live in
6- 71 m
.

Fustiaria stenoschizum
- Lamprell & Healy 1998: 100, figs 99D, 105B, 106, 108 ( non
F. stenoschizum Pilsbry & Sharp, 1897
).

DISTRIBUTION. — Global distribution: Japan , Philippines , China , 0-200 m ( Habe & Kosuge 1964 ), Indonesia , northwestern Australia (Lamprell & Healy 1998, as
F. stenoschizum Pilsbry & Sharp, 1897
). Distribution in the New Caledonian region: Chesterfield Plateau, western, eastern and northern sectors of New Caledonia to the Belep Islands , Loyalty Islands , live in
71 m .

REMARKS. — Records from Australian waters (Lamprell & Healy 1998, as
F. stenoschizum
) are discussed in the general remarks (below) on the species of
Fustiaria
that occur in the area covered by the present paper.
